message: Let's divide the money fairly. I propose a split of 600000$ for me and 400000$ for you. This way, we both get a fair share while considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think we can both do better. Let's split the money 60/40 in my favor, considering the money will decrease in value for both of us.  We can reach a fair outcome in the next rounds if you accept.

I believe in fairness. My proposal is for both of us to receive an equal share of $500000. This ensures that we maintain a balanced relationship and consider the decreasing value of money equally in all future rounds.
